title: Cheryl looks sensational in sparkling black dress at Pride Of Britain Awards
text:

Former Girls Aloud singer Cheryl , 36, looked phenomenal as she presented at the star-studded Pride Of Britain Awards 2019 in London on Monday.

The Fight For This Love hitmaker wowed at the glitzy bash wearing a dazzling black dress with shimmering sequined embellishments.

The mum-of-one's stylish ensemble featured a subtle cut-out design on the neckline and shimmering tassled shoulder sleeves.

Cheryl completed her stylish Pride Of Britain ensemble with a glamorous make-up look and a wavy updo hairstyle.

(Image: Andy Stenning/Daily Mirror)

(Image: Andy Stenning/Daily Mirror)

The Geordie star flashed a glimpse at her perfectly pearly whites as she presented the award for Good Morning Britain's Young Fundraiser.

Along with ITV hosts Ben Shepherd and Susanna Reid, the songstress beamed with a smile as she congratulated Aaron Hunter on his award.

Cheryl joined the likes of Carol Vorderman, Simon Cowell and Frank Lampard at the highly anticipated event.

(Image: Andy Stenning/Daily Mirror)

(Image: Andy Stenning/Daily Mirror)

Pride of Britain celebrates extraordinary people from across Britain who have shown incredible bravery and spirit.

The winners are nominated by members of the public from all walks of life and from all over the country.

Other celebrities at the awards included Love Islanders Molly-Mae Hague and Tommy Fury, Amanda Holden , Simon Cowell , the cast of Strictly Come Dancing and her This Morining co-host Phillip Schofield.

The Daily Mirror Pride of Britain Awards, in partnership with TSB, will broadcast on ITV on 5th November at 8pm .
description: The former Girls Aloud singer turned heads as she made a dazzling stage debut at the star-studded bash in London
